name: 4exbidv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, w1)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, w2))))))

stmt.origin: 2exbidv(s0, s1, w0, wex(s2, wex(s3, w1)), wex(s2, wex(s3, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, w1)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, w2))))))
-| wi(w0, wb(wex(s2, wex(s3, w1)), wex(s2, wex(s3, w2))))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, w1)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, w2))))))
-| wi(w0, wb(wex(s2, wex(s3, w1)), wex(s2, wex(s3, w2))))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wex(s2, wex(s3, w1)), wex(s2, wex(s3, w2))))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s2, w0)
-| diffsw(s3, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, w1)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, w2))))))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s2, w0)
-| diffsw(s3, w0)

comment: Formula-building rule for four existential quantifiers (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1995.)
